item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 14, 2025 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Zig's new LinkedList API (it's time to learn fieldParentPtr) (75 points | 39 comments)
2. Kezurou-Kai #39 (140 points | 8 comments)
3. Omnom: Self-hosted bookmarking with searchable, wysiwyg snapshots [showcase] (19 points | 2 comments)

5. Everything wrong with MCP (282 points | 126 comments)
6. Hacktical C: practical hacker's guide to the C programming language (12 points | discuss)
7. Open guide to equity compensation (479 points | 200 comments)
8. Mario Vargas Llosa has died (110 points | 13 comments)
9. Show HN: Resurrecting Infocom's Unix Z-Machine with Cosmopolitan (98 points | 21 comments)
10. Zotero Fullscreen Mode by Script (5 points | discuss)
11. Show HN: I made a free tool that analyzes SEC filings and posts detailed reports (190 points | 52 comments)
12. The Ford Executive Who Kept Score of Colleagues' Verbal Flubs (16 points | 9 comments)
13. New Vulnerability in GitHub Copilot, Cursor: Hackers Can Weaponize Code Agents (114 points | 55 comments)
14. NoProp: Training neural networks without back-propagation or forward-propagation (119 points | 29 comments)
15. Googler... ex-Googler (567 points | 410 comments)
16. Comparing economic inequality between the Roman Empire and the Han Dynasty (51 points | 43 comments)
17. Why Everything in the Universe Turns More Complex (97 points | 57 comments)
18. Writing Cursor rules with a Cursor rule (116 points | 33 comments)
19. She was chatting with friends in a Lyft. Then someone texted her what they said (59 points | 40 comments)
20. Neutrinos' maximum possible mass shrinks further (55 points | 17 comments)
21. Engineers Who Won't Commit (16 points | 6 comments)
22. Transformer Lab (94 points | 5 comments)
23. Implementing DeepSeek R1's GRPO algorithm from scratch (142 points | 3 comments)
24. Why Fennel? (240 points | 108 comments)
25. Math 13 – An Introduction to Abstract Mathematics [pdf] (149 points | 8 comments)
26. Show HN: Nissan's Leaf app doesn't have a home screen widget so I made my own (97 points | 70 comments)
27. Docker Model Runner (72 points | 19 comments)
28. The dark side of the Moomins (294 points | 94 comments)
29. Quick Primer on MCP Using Ollama and LangChain (102 points | 16 comments)
30. How much oranger do red orange bags make oranges look? (134 points | 77 comments)
